DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of RG1068 (synthetic human secretin) with MRCP in subjects with abnormalities of the pancreas.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Synthetic Human Secretin-Enhanced MRCP in Subjects With Abnormalities of the Pancreas
DOC.criteria: History of pancreatitis Medically stable Able to give informed consent Prior history of pancreatic resection Prior history of pancreatic duct drainage procedure Presence of a pancreatic stent Unstable cardiovascular disease Any contraindication to MRI procedure Pregnancy
